name: Typemania
description:
Train your typing using Typemania! A aesthetic typing test. Typemania includes out of the box customization for colors and all quote packs which makes it easier than ever to make a pack and send it to a friend for some competetive typing. Typemania also offers out of the box packs including famous quotes from all around the world.

You can also use this program to improve at your own pase and compare to your previous self as all your previous scores are saved and your average is shown after each quote typed as seen in screenshot 3. 

Currently all of the games assets are exposed in the 'src/resources' folder.  As in here you can change the colors language translations and everything including the text in the game and the colors and sounds. If you think that there is a more suitable asset for a specific element you can post about it in the 'Suggestions' community topic below and i will review it. Also any new quote packs are welcome.

The source code can be found at: https://github.com/WillMexe/Typemania
